title: The religious left raises its voice
itunes:title: The religious left raises its voice
description: For decades, the political right has made religiosity their brand. But a "religious left" has risen since President Trump's election, and progressive clergy members have witnessed a renewal of interest in spirituality. Have evangelical conservatives finally met their match in the political arena?
itunes:summary: For decades, the political right has made religiosity their brand.
